text: is a town located in Sorachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 12,365, and a density of 61 persons per km². The total area is 203.84 km². ==Notable people from Kuriyama== *Tadashi Watanabe, computer engineer ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Kuriyama, Hokkaido
